backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor and a large set of types for media content, users, ads, approvals, wallets, and affiliate systems, integrating multiple mixins and storage modules. No business logic is shown beyond type declarations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, and test references with high-level metadata. Used for tracking feature completeness and validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their functionality, routing, UI components, and styling updates across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style variables defining theme colors, dark mode values, and global styling for backgrounds, text, borders, and layout.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up metadata and linking to the React application entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration registering all user and admin routes, wrapping admin paths with AdminRouteGuard, and connecting pages to the layout.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Displays a single banner advertisement, tracks views and clicks, and opens the target URL when clicked.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessDenie: Shows a styled access-denied screen with messaging and navigation back to the home page for non-admin users.
Guards routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing a loader or access denied screen when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/AdSidebar.tsx: Renders up to three sidebar ads, tracking impressions and clicks for each and linking out to target URLs.
Displays clickable media categories with icons and navigates to category-specific pages.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoomComponen: Renders a real-time chat room with polling, text and file message sending, and message display with metadata.
frontend/src/components/ContentCard.tsx: Shows a media item preview card with icon, stats, and hover play overlay for videos, audio, or images.
frontend/src/components/ContentGrid.tsx: Displays all and popular media content in tabbed grids and opens a content player on selection.
frontend/src/components/ContentPlayer.ts: Provides a modal player for video, audio, or image content with playback controls, rating, and metadata display.
frontend/src/components/DisplayScreen.ts: Shows currently active display content with auto‑play video and content type badge.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with navigation links, social icons, branding, and optional Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with navigation, search, auth actions, and optional admin menus.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the landing hero section with animated visuals and buttons to explore streaming or open the wallet.
frontend/src/components/HeroHelper.tsx: Implements an interactive assistant widget with chat, voice input, speech synthesis, and saved user memory.
frontend/src/components/JitsiMeetIntegra: Provides a Jitsi Meet video‑conference controller with room setup, event handling, and participant state tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the global page layout with header, footer, dynamic background, and the HeroHelper overlay.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Shows a modal for users to enter their name and complete initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/SharedPlaybackCo: Displays a shared playback UI with a preview area, play/pause toggle, and room creation option.
frontend/src/components/VideoCallCompone: Provides a UI-only video call interface with mute, video toggle, and end-call controls using local state and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/WAN22Integration: Implements a form-driven UI for generating AI content via a simulated WAN 2.2 API, supporting content options, tabs, and preview/download placeholders.
frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts: Defines the admin navigation structure with labeled routes, icons, sections, and a helper to group items by section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
Maps backend actor methods to boolean capability flags and exposes them with a loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context, hooks, and a provider for handling Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a large set of React Query hooks for admin- and media-related calls, dynamically checking actor method availability and handling mutations with toasts.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base, theme colors, typography, layout constraints, and custom utility classes for consistent app styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAdsPage.tsx: Provides UI and logic for creating, updating, toggling, and deleting advertisements with form handling and CTR calculation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAffiliatePage.ts: Displays affiliate tiers and includes a dialog to create new tiers with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApprovalPage.tsx: Aggregates multiple pending approval queues with actions to approve or reject various content and user submissions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContentPage.tsx: Allows admins to upload, list, and delete content with upload progress tracking and metadata form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDisplayPage.tsx: Provides UI for viewing current display content and submitting new screen content via a form.
Offers admin tools to search, approve, reject, and delete various pending content types.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHiiYahChatPage.t: Manages pending broadcast and hero join requests with approve/reject actions and tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminImageLibraryPage: Handles image uploads with progress tracking and allows admins to approve, reject, download, or purge images.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteAcceptPage: Validates and redeems admin invite tokens, handling login requirements and redirecting after success.
Page for admins to view, generate, and copy invite codes using React Query and actor API calls.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMallPage.tsx: Local CRUD interface for managing mall items with dialogs for create, edit, and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMediaUploadRoomP: Admin-only interface for uploading and managing media content with progress tracking and content filtering.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMemberDirectoryP: Displays all user profiles with search and role filtering, fetched via actor API.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPriceControlRoom: Admin interface for adjusting subscription, content, and mall pricing with simulated save operations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPricingTermsPage: Admin page for editing subscription pricing and managing terms and conditions, including loading, creating, and updating active terms. Includes tabbed UI for terms and pricing sections with admin-only access control.
frontend/src/pages/AdminWalletManagement: Admin dashboard for viewing and managing wallet recovery seeds and monitoring mock BTC balance data. Supports seed visibility toggling, clipboard copying, searching, and displays blockchain-related analytics.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Affiliate dashboard for generating, viewing, and copying referral links and viewing tier-based referral statistics. Integrates backend hooks for link creation and performance data.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays media content filtered by category and allows selecting an item to open a player. Fetches category content and shows loading, empty, or grid views depending on state.
frontend/src/pages/CreditCardPage.tsx: User page for accessing a mock Excalibur credit card with placeholder balance loading functionality. Requires login and displays a stylized card preview with user-entered amount handling.
Creative workspace page featuring tabs for overview, Jitsi Meet integration, WAN 2.2 AI tools, and project management. Includes a hero section with studio branding and interactive project selection.
frontend/src/pages/FlixiodTestPage.tsx: Page embedding Flixiod streaming in an iframe with navigation, alerts, and a test player section.
frontend/src/pages/HiiYahChatPage.tsx: Chat hub integrating Rocket.Chat with connection codes, chat rooms, calls, and authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing featured content categories, intro text, and financial services with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/IHeartRadioTestPage.t: Page embedding iHeartRadio streaming in an iframe with alerts and external link support.
frontend/src/pages/MallPage.tsx: Displays Clear Magic Mall branding, search input, and a coming-soon message for shopping features.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: User registration form with validation, async submission, and success confirmation flow.
frontend/src/pages/StreamingPartnersPage: Displays a grid of streaming platforms with icons, descriptions, and buttons to test or open each service.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays active Terms and Conditions with loading skeletons and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Manages wallet creation, seed handling, address display, and transaction viewing for authenticated users.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces representing media, transactions, wallet data, and other backend-related structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for restoring the admin menu from v44 and ensuring full admin moderation actions, including features, issues, and pending requests.
